Question: This person once told his brother Lucien in April 1801, "Skillful conquerors have not got entangled with priests.
Hints: On completion of his studies at Brienne in 1784, this person was admitted to the elite École Militaire in Paris.
Joséphine had her daughter Hortense marry this person's brother Louis.
This person sent General Horace Sebastiani as envoy extraordinary, promising to help the Ottoman Empire recover lost territories.
